headline: Updates
body:
Updates of the last weeks/months:
- donate-bonus update (beta, example give from '2020-10-03' to '2020-10-03' a 10% to all donats)
- layout with a dark and light mode, you can switch it in config and the user self (config based)
- layout get some meta-data for the link-preview
- layout character search icon added
- new module sro-kill added
- character buffs added in character-details
- paginator cache time changed to 1min
- ticket-notification for admins added (config based)
- added multi language (beta, not all parts has this option)
- checkbox @ register added to confirm terms/rules (config based)
- resend register added

headline: Welcome @ PServerCMS
body: Welcome at the relaunch of the PServerCMS
